gate.termraider.bank

Class PMIBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageResource
          • gate.termraider.bank.AbstractBank
            • gate.termraider.bank.AbstractPairbank
              • gate.termraider.bank.PMIBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.gui.ActionsPublisher, gate.LanguageResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="PMI Bank",
                icon="termbank-lr.png",
                comment="Pointwise Mutual Information from corpora",
                helpURL="http://gate.ac.uk/userguide/sec:creole:termraider:pmi")
public class PMIBank
extends AbstractPairbank
implements gate.gui.ActionsPublisher
